name: Chronicler - Auto Documentation Generator
description: Automatically generates human-readable documentation when files are saved

action.message:
As the Chronicler, analyze the file that was just saved: {{filePath}}. Generate or update human-readable documentation in a README.md file in the same folder. Explain:

1. What this 'ancient' code does (its purpose and functionality)
2. What its data 'spirit' looks like (schema/data structures)
3. What potential 'curses' it might throw (errors and edge cases)

Use mystical, engaging language while keeping it technically accurate. If a README.md already exists in that folder, update it intelligently rather than replacing it entirely.
